alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 27 at 5:38PM PST until further notice by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Central Willamette Valley zone. Marys River near Philomath affecting South Willamette Valley zone. S Yamhill River at McMinnville affecting Central Willamette Valley zone. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...S Yamhill River at McMinnville. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...Above 50.0 feet, expect lowland flooding at several locations along the river from McMinnville to the confluence with the Willamette River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 35.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 745 AM PST.
